title: Correction to: Field releases of the exotic parasitoid Trissolcus japonicus (Hymenoptera: Scelionidae) and survey of native parasitoids attacking Halyomorpha halys (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae) in Michigan
content: This is a correction to: Olivia Simaz, Julie Michaelson, Julianna K Wilson, Elijah Talamas, Larry Gut, John Pote, Marianna Sz≈±cs, Field releases of the exotic parasitoid Trissolcus japonicus (Hymenoptera: Scelionidae) and survey of native parasitoids attacking Halyomorpha halys (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae) in Michigan, Environmental Entomology, 2023, nvad102, https://doi.org/10.1093/ee/nvad102
